类 Listener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • Listener
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener

    public class Listener
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Runnable

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Listener(BallFrame bf, java.util.ArrayList ball)
      Constructor for objects of class Listener Not only should we control JTextField and JButton in BallFrame, but also numbers of all.

      void mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      I perfer to call this method as "naughty mouse" each time we click our mouse,we don't know the exact information of such ball because of random choice.

      • Listener

        public Listener(BallFrame bf,
                java.util.ArrayList ball)
        Constructor for objects of class Listener Not only should we control JTextField and JButton in BallFrame, but also numbers of all.
        参数:
        bf - the instance of the BallFrame.
        ball - the balls.

    • 方法详细资料

      • mousePressed

        public void mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        I perfer to call this method as "naughty mouse" each time we click our mouse,we don't know the exact information of such ball because of random choice.
        指定者:
        mousePressed 在接口中 java.awt.event.MouseListener
        覆盖:
        mousePressed 在类中 java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
